roleset.name: make bigger
roleset.note: ENLARGE-V NOTES: Preposition 'by' takes precedence over EXT tag. (from enlarge.01-v)
ENLARGED-J NOTES: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to enlarge.01. Enlarge.01 is a member of VN class other_cos-45.4. Framed by Katie. (from enlarged.01-j)

example.name: just transitive
example.text: It appears that the only thing Congress-1 is learning from the HUD story is how *trace*-1 to enlarge its control of the honey pot going to special interests.
example.arg: its control of the honey pot going to special interests

example.name: with EXT
example.text: [Avondale Industries Inc., New Orleans,]-1 received a $23 million contract from the Navy *trace*-1 to enlarge by 50% the capacity of an auxiliary oiler.
example.arg: the capacity of an auxiliary oiler

example.name: passive
example.text: Elements of the left are also reflexively opposed; they see service as a cover for the draft, or fear the regimentation of youth, or want to see rights-1 enlarged *trace*-1, not obligations.

example.name: with start and end points
example.text: John enlarged the photo of Mary from wallet-sized to billboard-sized.

example.name: with start and end points
example.text: Postop changes: the caliber is enlarged from 1 cm to 2 cm and there is no calcification.

example.name: With arg 0
example.text: Multiple mesenteric lymph nodes are enlarged by the pathology.
